title: RELIC SHIELD COME JUNGLER | EASY MONEY BABY

body:
Hey guys, hope you like the video. But ey, if you guys wanna try this at home, make sure not to buy relic as first item! Go for machete first and then Relic. I like that idea of building relic into taragon as jungler a lot. 
You have so many benefits, here are some:

You pay 350 gold and in about 7~8 minutes you will get it back and even have more then you have spent 

You can actually build red/blue smite and still have the warding option, which is really really good.

The quest  is now 500 gold, 250 gold cheaper than last patch, and the relic shield line was not made more difficult to complete while killing the jungle.

Also you can tax lanes without getting flamed by the laners, complaining about taking Gold away from them.ï»¿
